## ğŸ”§ Manual Steps to Complete

### 1. Add Repository Topics

Go to: https://github.com/brandonqr/liveweb

1. Click on the gear icon (âš™ï¸) next to "About"
2. Add these topics (one at a time or comma-separated):
   - `ai`
   - `gemini`
   - `gemini-3-flash`
   - `voice-recognition`
   - `web-builder`
   - `code-generation`
   - `react`
   - `nodejs`
   - `express`
   - `vite`
   - `speech-recognition`
   - `ai-assistant`
   - `web-development`

### 2. Add Repository Description

The description is already set, but you can enhance it:
- Current: "AI-powered web builder using voice commands and Google Gemini 3 Flash"
- Enhanced: "ğŸ™ï¸ AI-powered web builder using voice commands and Google Gemini 3 Flash. Build complete web applications by speaking naturally."

### 3. Add Social Preview Image (Optional)

1. Create a 1280x640px image
2. Save as `.github/social-preview.png`
3. Commit and push

### 4. Enable GitHub Discussions (Optional)

1. Go to Settings â†’ General
2. Scroll to "Features"
3. Enable "Discussions"

### 5. Add Repository Website (If You Have One)

1. Go to Settings â†’ Pages
2. Configure if you have a website

### 6. Set Up Branch Protection (Recommended)

1. Go to Settings â†’ Branches
2. Add rule for `main` branch
3. Require pull request reviews
4. Require status checks to pass
